docs.abstract: He reimagined Wagner for the modern world, including a “Ring” focused on ecological destruction.
docs.snippet: He reimagined Wagner for the modern world, including a “Ring” focused on ecological destruction.
docs.lead_paragraph: Harry Kupfer, a German opera director whose inventive and often provocative stagings of Wagner oligarchpieces put him in the vanguard of a generation that sought to reinterpret the canon, died on Dec. 30 in Berlin. He was 84.

headline.main: Harry Kupfer, Director and ‘Opera King of Berlin,’ Dies at 84
headline.print_headline: Harry Kupfer, 84, ‘Opera King of Berlin’ Who Updated Wagner, Dies

docs.abstract: A new program lets students customize their meals, participate in taste tests and brainstorm ways to redesign their school cafeterias.
docs.snippet: A new program lets students customize their meals, participate in taste tests and brainstorm ways to redesign their school cafeterias.
docs.lead_paragraph: On a recent Tuesday, the cafeteria at KairosPDX charter school in Portland, Ore., was buzzing as students lined up to taste two freshly made butternut squash recipes. On one side of the table was roasted butternut squash. On the other side, a creamy butternut squash soup.

headline.main: What if Children Ran the School Lunchroom?
headline.print_headline: Putting Students in Charge of the Cafeteria

docs.abstract: Her “Ashton Manual,” published in 1999, has become a cornerstone for people all over the world dealing with benzodiazepine dependence.
docs.snippet: Her “Ashton Manual,” published in 1999, has become a cornerstone for people all over the world dealing with benzodiazepine dependence.
docs.lead_paragraph: When researchers began tinkering with a class of tranquilizer drugs called benzodiazepines in the 1950s, they felt they had uncovered a solution to modern anxiety and insomnia. Benzodiazepines worked quickly and effectively to quell racing heartbeats and dismiss spinning thoughts. The dozen or so different types — including Xanax, Valium, Ativan and Klonopin — became the most frequently prescribed drugs around the world, even as concerns arose about their potential side effects and addictive properties.

headline.main: Dr. Heather Ashton, 90, Dies; Helped People Quit Anxiety Drugs
headline.print_headline: Heather Ashton, 90; Helped People Quit Drugs

docs.abstract: For exquisitely simple dishes that don’t skimp on flavor, David Tanis looks to Japan.
docs.snippet: For exquisitely simple dishes that don’t skimp on flavor, David Tanis looks to Japan.
docs.lead_paragraph: I manage to have a pretty good diet throughout the year, eating lots of fresh vegetables and fruit, with moderate (mostly) wine consumption.

headline.main: A January Dinner Party That Doesn’t Deprive
headline.print_headline: Short Days Need to Be Long on Flavor

docs.abstract: Foreign affairs have played a strictly limited role so far in the Democratic primary, but the killing of Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani could reshape the contest.
docs.snippet: Foreign affairs have played a strictly limited role so far in the Democratic primary, but the killing of Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani could reshape the contest.
docs.lead_paragraph: The American strike in Baghdad that killed the Iranian general Qassim Suleimani thrust foreign policy to the center of the Democratic presidential race, drawing expressions of grave concern from the leading candidates and stoking a new debate in the party about the American military presence in the Middle East.

headline.main: Airstrike Pushes National Security to Forefront of 2020 Race
headline.print_headline: Airstrike Pushes Foreign Policy To Front of Presidential Race

docs.abstract: The goal was to prove American resolve in the face of Iranian attacks. Now, American officials have no doubt the Iranians will respond — but they don’t know how quickly, or how furiously.
docs.snippet: The goal was to prove American resolve in the face of Iranian attacks. Now, American officials have no doubt the Iranians will respond — but they don’t know how quickly, or how furiously.
docs.lead_paragraph: President Trump’s decision to strike and kill the second most powerful official in Iran turns a slow-simmering conflict with Tehran into a boiling one, and is the riskiest move made by the United States in the Middle East since the invasion of Iraq in 2003.

headline.main: For Trump, a Risky Gamble to Deter Iran
headline.print_headline: Sudden Strike Is the Riskiest U.S. Move in the Middle East Since 2003

docs.abstract: Mr. Oliver’s album covers for the 4AD label were a fitting complement to music by influential alternative bands like Pixies and the Breeders.
docs.snippet: Mr. Oliver’s album covers for the 4AD label were a fitting complement to music by influential alternative bands like Pixies and the Breeders.
docs.lead_paragraph: Vaughan Oliver, a British graphic designer whose album covers for the independent record label 4AD became visual accompaniments to influential alternative rock bands like Pixies, the Breeders and Cocteau Twins, died on Sunday in London. He was 62.

headline.main: Vaughan Oliver, 62, Dies; His Designs Gave Indie Rock ‘Physical Dimension’
headline.print_headline: Vaughan Oliver, 62, Who Imagined Album Covers to Accompany Each Band’s Music
